network

Class Communication

  • java.lang.Object
    • network.Communication
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Discussion

    public class Communication
extends java.lang.Object
    thos class allows to creat a communication between two client connected by socket or a client and the server

      • newKey

        protected void newKey(int position)
               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                      java.security.InvalidKeyException,
                      javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException,
                      java.io.IOException
        this method allwos to generate a new key with a position in parameter
        Parameters:
        position - is the position allows if the message is send ou receive, is the position in the communication transmitter or reveiver
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException - is an exception if a particular algorithm is requested but is not avaible
        java.security.InvalidKeyException - is an exception if the key is invalid
        javax.crypto.NoSuchPaddingException - is an exception if the padding mechanism is not available
        java.io.IOException - is the exception if there is a failed or an interruption when a I/O operation
